caption.p:
( a) Normalized X-ray patterns of all the synthesized solids. From bottom to top, the reported solids are as follows: “as made” material (a.m.), calcined support M41 (
i ) and final materials, M41–RhB–Z ( ii), M41–Thy–Z ( iii), M41–Car–Z ( iv), M41–Cin–Z ( v). ( b) TEM images of M41 solids ( i), M41–RhB–Z ( ii), M41–Thy–Z ( iii), M41–Car–Z ( iv), M41–Cin–Z ( v). Insets correspond to a 2× magnification of the framed areas.
